doc.field: TO SELL 12.8 BILLION DLRS IN BILLS

- The U.S. Treasury said it will sell 12.8 billion dlrs of three and six-month bills at its regular auction next week. The March 30 sale, to be evenly divided between the three and six month issues, will result in a paydown of 1.2 billion dlrs as maturing bills total 13.99 billion dlrs. The bills will be issued April 2.
